title: Unexpected crash in cast.rs:110

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Encountered an unexpected crash in v1.23.0 (my distro hasn't caught up with the 1.24.0 release) having forgotten to include something. Details below, along with a minimal example attached. Apologies if already reported, I don't have the time at the moment to sift through reports to check.

```
error[E0412]: cannot find type `RwLock` in this scope
 --> src/lib.rs:9:15
  |
9 |     pub data: RwLock<bool>,
  |               ^^^^^^ not found in this scope
help: possible candidate is found in another module, you can import it into scope
  |
8 | use std::sync::RwLock;
  |

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.23.0 running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'explicit panic', src/librustc_typeck/check/cast.rs:110:17
stack backtrace:
   0: rust_metadata_std_36256d872eff3709501eed2e0dd9b78
   1: rust_metadata_std_36256d872eff3709501eed2e0dd9b78
   2: rust_metadata_std_36256d872eff3709501eed2e0dd9b78
   3: rust_metadata_std_36256d872eff3709501eed2e0dd9b78
   4: std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook
   5: rust_metadata_rustc_typeck_61da4d0986aa95b98a6709ae96e41ea2
   6: rust_metadata_rustc_typeck_61da4d0986aa95b98a6709ae96e41ea2
   7: rust_metadata_rustc_typeck_61da4d0986aa95b98a6709ae96e41ea2
   8: <unknown>
   9: <unknown>
  10: rust_metadata_rustc_d8855d9a8d03c8f555489deb4e4b18aa
  11: rust_metadata_rustc_d8855d9a8d03c8f555489deb4e4b18aa
  12: rustc::ty::maps::<impl rustc::ty::maps::queries::typeck_tables_of<'tcx>>::try_get
  13: rustc::ty::maps::TyCtxtAt::typeck_tables_of
  14: rustc::ty::maps::<impl rustc::ty::context::TyCtxt<'a, 'tcx, 'lcx>>::typeck_tables_of
  15: <unknown>
  16: <unknown>
  17: rustc_typeck::check_crate
  18: <unknown>
  19: rustc_driver::driver::compile_input
  20: rustc_driver::run_compiler
  21: rust_metadata_rustc_driver_1899264b214dfa9f9a77a2f766dad1b2
  22: __rust_maybe_catch_panic
  23: <unknown>
  24: rust_metadata_std_36256d872eff3709501eed2e0dd9b78
  25: start_thread
  26: clone

error: Could not compile `crash_test`.

To learn more, run the command again with --verbose.
```

[crash_example.zip](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/files/1748859/crash_example.zip)
